segments.text: Have you started cleaning up your room yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven't gotten started on my room yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When exactly do you plan on cleaning it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have every intention of cleaning my room later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought I asked you to clean your room earlier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I already told you that I'm going to do it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Remember to vacuum the floor and dust everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Make sure that you don't go anywhere until you clean your room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll clean my room before I leave .
segments.speaker: S2
